chinese: 遵守；忍受 You must abide by the rules of the game.
廢除 The government decided to abolish the old law.
example: 政府決定廢除這項舊法律。

chinese: 吸收 Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.
example: 植物從土壤中吸收養分。

chinese: The island is rich in abundant wildlife.
example: 這座島嶼有豐富的野生動物。

chinese: 加速 We need to accelerate the pace of production.
example: 我們需要加快生產速度。

chinese: 管道；進入 Students have free access to the library.
example: 學生可以免費使用圖書館。

chinese: 陪伴 I will accompany you to the hospital.
Computers account for 5% of our sales.
example: 電腦佔了我們銷售額的5%。

chinese: 達成；實現 You can achieve anything if you work hard.
example: 如果你努力，你可以達成任何事。

chinese: 承認；感激 He acknowledged his mistake immediately.
example: 他立刻承認了他的錯誤。

chinese: 獲得；取得 It takes time to acquire a new language.
She admitted that she was wrong.
採用；收養 The company decided to adopt a new strategy.
崇拜；熱愛 They adore their new baby girl.
example: 他們非常疼愛他們的新生女兒。

chinese: 進步；提前 Technology has made great advances.
影響 The weather will affect our travel plans.
example: 天氣會影響我們的旅行計畫。

chinese: He has an aggressive management style.
example: 他的管理風格很積極且強勢。

chinese: 警覺的；提醒 Be alert to any changes in the patient.
過敏的 I am allergic to seafood.
We have no other alternative but to wait.
example: 除了等待，我們別無選擇。

chinese: 業餘人士 This competition is for amateurs only.
example: 這場比賽僅限業餘選手參加。

chinese: 模稜兩可的 His answer was very ambiguous.
抱負；野心 Her ambition is to become a doctor.
example: 她的抱負是成為⼀名醫生。

chinese: 家用電器 Modern appliances save us a lot of time.
example: 現代家電幫我們節省很多時間。

chinese: 申請；應用 You can apply for the job online.
example: 你可以在網路上申請這份工作。

chinese: 方法；接近 We need a new approach to the problem.
example: 我們需要處理這問題的新方法。

chinese: 贊成；核准 My parents don't approve of my smoking.
大約的 What is the approximate cost of the trip?
example: 這趟旅行大約的花費是多少？

chinese: He is apt to forget things when stressed.
喚起；激起 Her strange behavior aroused suspicion.
example: 她奇怪的行為引起了懷疑。

chinese: 文章；物品 I read an interesting article today.
example: 我今天讀了⼀篇有趣的文章。

chinese: 人造的 This product contains no artificial colors.
example: 這項產品不含人工色素。

chinese: 至於 As for the price, we can discuss it later.
example: 至於價格，我們可以晚點討論。

chinese: 組裝；集合 It took hours to assemble the furniture.
example: 花了好幾個小時才把家具組裝好。

chinese: 斷⾔；主張 She continued to assert her innocence.
example: 她繼續堅稱自己是清白的。

chinese: Most people associate summer with heat.
example: 大多數人把夏天和炎熱聯想在⼀起。

chinese: 假設；承擔
使驚訝 The news astonished everyone.
自在；放心 I feel at ease when I am with friends.
example: 和朋友在⼀起時我感到很自在。

chinese: Thousands of jobs are at stake.
example: 數千個工作崗位面臨威脅。

chinese: 附上 Please attach a photo to your application.
example: 請在申請表上附⼀張照片。

chinese: 參加；出席 She will attend the meeting tomorrow.
態度 He has a positive attitude toward life.
example: 他對生活抱持積極的態度。

chinese: 歸因於 He attributes his success to hard work.
example: 他將他的成功歸功於努力。

chinese: We had authentic Italian food for dinner.
example: 我們晚餐吃了道地的義大利菜。

chinese: Is this seat available?
敬畏 We watched the sunset in awe.
選票；投票 The issue was decided by secret ballot.
example: 這問題是由秘密投票決定的。

chinese: 貧瘠的 The land is too barren to grow crops.
example: 這塊地太貧瘠了，無法種植作物。

chinese: 障礙 Language can be a barrier to travel.
代表 I am writing on behalf of my company.
example: 我代表我的公司寫這封信。

chinese: 小心；提防 Beware of the dog.
融入 The spy tried to blend in with the crowd.
眨眼 She blinked in the bright sunlight.
example: 她在燦爛的陽光下眨了眨眼。

chinese: 聯繫；結合 The two sisters share a strong bond.
小亭子；攤位 We sat in a quiet booth in the cafe.
example: 我們坐在咖啡廳安靜的隔間位。

chinese: 邊界 We crossed the border into Canada.
example: 我們跨越國境進入加拿大。

chinese: 困擾；打擾 Sorry to bother you, but can you help?
example: 抱歉打擾，但你能幫個忙嗎？

chinese: 彈跳 The kids love to bounce on the bed.
故障；崩潰 The car broke down on the highway.
殘暴的 The weather was brutal this winter.
example: 今年冬天的氣候非常嚴酷。

chinese: 預算 We are traveling on a tight budget.
example: 我們旅遊的預算很吃緊。

chinese: 突然... Everyone burst out laughing.
example: 每個人都突然大笑起來。

chinese: 總的來說 By and large, the plan was a success.
example: 總體而⾔，這個計畫是成功的。

chinese: 絕不 This is by no means an easy task.
捕捉；捕獲 The camera captured the beautiful moment.
example: 相機捕捉到了那個美好的瞬間。

chinese: 警告；謹慎 You should exercise caution when driving.
儀式；典禮 The wedding ceremony was very simple.
確定的；某些 I am certain that I locked the door.
證書 She received a certificate of completion.
珍愛；珍藏 I will cherish the memories forever.
example: 我會永遠珍藏這些回憶。

chinese: Can you clarify what you mean?
example: 你能解釋清楚你的意思嗎？

chinese: The sand was coarse and dry.
集體的 This was a collective decision.
商業 式。)
He committed a serious crime.
比較 There is no comparison between the two.
有能力的 She is a highly competent teacher.
example: 她是⼀位非常有能力的老師。

chinese: Salt is a chemical compound.
強迫性的 He is a compulsive gambler.
example: 他是⼀個有強迫性賭癮的人。

chinese: 專注；濃度 I lost my concentration because of noise.
example: 因為噪音，我失去了注意力。

chinese: 關心；擔心 Your health is our main concern.
example: 你的健康是我們最關心的事。

chinese: We need concrete evidence to prove it.
example: 我們需要具體的證據來證明。

chinese: 執行；行為 We conducted an experiment in class.
example: 我們在課堂上做了⼀個實驗。

chinese: 有意識的 She was conscious of someone following her.
example: 她意識到有人在跟蹤她。

chinese: 諮詢 You should consult a doctor.
具傳染性的 Laughing is often contagious.
相反
說服 I tried to convince him to stay.
有說服力的 He provided a convincing argument.
example: 他提供了⼀個有說服力的論點。

chinese: 有禮貌的 The hotel staff was very courteous.
The event received wide media coverage.
example: 這起事件獲得媒體廣泛報導。

chinese: 垂涎；貪圖 Do not covet your neighbor's house.
溫馨舒適的 This room is small but cozy.
創造物 The painting is a beautiful creation.
example: 這幅畫是⼀個美麗的創作。

chinese: 創造力 Children have a lot of creativity.
生物 Strange creatures live in the deep sea.
example: 深海裡住著奇怪的生物。

chinese: The cat crept toward the bird.
至關重要的 Timing is crucial for this project.
example: 時機對這個計畫至關重要。

chinese: 耕作；培養 We should cultivate good habits.
習俗；海關 It is a local custom to give gifts.
欺騙 He tried to deceive the public.
You need to take decisive action now.
example: 你現在需要採取果斷的行動。

chinese: 婉拒；下降 She declined the invitation to dinner.
裝飾 We decorated the house for Christmas.
example: 我們為了聖誕節裝飾房子。

chinese: 認為 The area was deemed unsafe for children.
example: 該區域被認為對小孩不安全。

chinese: 定義 What is the definition of this word?
example: 這個單字的定義是什麼？

chinese: 故意的 It was a deliberate act of kindness.
These flowers are very delicate.
欣喜 To my delight, I passed the exam.
example: 令我高興的是，我通過了考試。

chinese: 要求；需求 There is a high demand for new cars.
示範；證明 He demonstrated how to use the machine.
example: 他示範了如何使用這台機器。

chinese: 否認 She is in denial about her problems.
example: 她不願面對自己的問題。

chinese: 出發 The train is scheduled to depart at 8 AM.
example: 火車預定在上午 8 點出發。

chinese: 使沮喪；壓下 The rainy weather depresses me.
源自；取得 Many English words derive from Latin.
example: 許多英文單字源自拉丁文。

chinese: 描述 Please give a brief description of the man.
example: 請簡短描述⼀下那個男人。

chinese: 慾望；渴望 She has a strong desire to travel.
目的地 We finally reached our destination.
example: 我們終於到達了目的地。

chinese: 偵測；察覺 The smoke alarm can detect fire.
example: 煙霧警報器可以偵測到火災。

chinese: 勤奮地 He worked diligently to finish the task.
example: 他勤奮工作以完成任務。

chinese: 昏暗的 The light in the room was very dim.
example: 房間裡的燈光非常昏暗。

chinese: He gave a very diplomatic answer.
example: 他給了⼀個非常圓滑的回答。

chinese: 方向；指示 Which direction are you going?
不贊成 Her parents disapprove of her boyfriend.
example: 她的⽗⺟不喜歡她的男朋友。

chinese: 紀律；訓練 Yoga requires a lot of discipline.
偽裝 He wore a wig to disguise himself.
example: 他戴上假髮來偽裝自己。

chinese: 混亂；失調 The room was in a state of disorder.
可有可無的
爭議 The two neighbors are in a dispute.
example: 這兩位鄰居正在發生爭執。

chinese: 中斷；擾亂 The noise disrupted my sleep.
遙遠的 He dreams of traveling to distant lands.
example: 他夢想著去遙遠的地方旅行。

chinese: 明顯不同的 There is a distinct smell of smoke here.
She has a distinctive voice.
分心
打擾 Do not disturb me while I am working.
文件；記錄 Please sign the document at the bottom.
支配；主導 One company dominates the market.
The project was doomed from the start.
example: 這個計畫從⼀開始就注定失敗。

chinese: 懷疑 I doubt if he will come today.
example: 我懷疑他今天會不會來。

chinese: Prices have fallen dramatically.
順道拜訪 Why don't you drop by this afternoon?
example: 你今天下午何不順道過來坐坐？

chinese: 乾旱 The crops died because of the drought.
He was dubbed "The King of Pop".
example: 他被稱為「流行音樂之王」。

chinese: 努力 It takes a lot of effort to learn a language.
example: 學習語⾔需要付出很多努力。

chinese: He made an elaborate plan for the party.
example: 他為派對制定了⼀個詳盡的計畫。

chinese: 消除；淘汰 We need to eliminate the risk of fire.
example: 我們需要消除火災風險。

chinese: 浮現；顯露 The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
example: 太陽從雲層後露了出來。

chinese: 移居國外 Emigration has increased in recent years.
example: 近年來移居國外的人數增加了。

chinese: 帝國 The Roman Empire lasted for centuries.
example: 羅馬帝國持續了數個世紀。

chinese: Please enclose a photo with your CV.
example: 請在簡歷中附上⼀張照片。

chinese: 遭遇；遇到 I encountered an old friend today.
example: 我今天遇到了⼀位老朋友。

chinese: 忍受；持久 She had to endure a lot of pain.
example: 她必須忍受巨大的痛苦。

chinese: 提升；增進 Good lighting will enhance the room.
example: 良好的採光會增進房間的美感。

chinese: 巨大的 This house is enormous for two people.
example: 這房子對兩個人來說太大了。

chinese: 熱情 He showed great enthusiasm for the job.
example: 他對這份工作展現了極大的熱情。

chinese: 嫉妒的 They were envious of his success.
裝備；配備 The rooms are equipped with AC.
It is not ethical to lie to patients.
example: 對病人撒謊是不道德的。

chinese: 評估 The teacher gave an evaluation of my work.
example: 老師對我的作品進行了評估。

chinese: 證據 There is no evidence to support his claim.
example: 沒有證據支持他的主張。

chinese: 誇張；誇大 Don't exaggerate; it didn't hurt that much.
超過 You must not exceed the speed limit.
過量
過度的 Excessive drinking can damage the liver.
排除 The price excludes tax and tip.
example: 價格不包含稅金和小費。

chinese: This is an exclusive interview.
執行；處決 The plan was executed perfectly.
He exerted all his strength to move it.
example: 他用盡全身力氣去搬動它。

chinese: The long journey exhausted the kids.
消耗；花費 You shouldn't expend too much energy.
example: 你不應該消耗太多能量。

chinese: We should not exploit natural resources.
example: 我們不應過度開發自然資源。

chinese: 臉部的 His facial expression showed surprise.
example: 他的面部表情顯示出驚訝。

chinese: 逐漸消失 The music began to fade away.
熟悉的 Her face looks familiar to me.
example: 她的臉我看起來很眼熟。

chinese: 恩惠；偏好 Can you do me a favor?
盛宴 We prepared a feast for the guests.
example: 我們為客人準備了盛宴。

chinese: 肥沃的 The soil here is very fertile.
猛烈地 The tiger fought fiercely.
填寫

My working hours are very flexible.
example: 我的工作時間非常靈活。

chinese: 繁榮；興旺 The plants flourish in the sun.
愚蠢的 It was foolish of me to leave my keys.
example: 我把鑰匙留在那裡真是太蠢了。

chinese: 預測；預報 What is the weather forecast for today?
example: 今天的天氣預報是什麼？

chinese: 格式 Please follow the format of this letter.
公式；配方 What is the formula for success?
財富；運氣 He made a large fortune in real estate.
example: 他在房地產方面賺了⼀大筆錢。

chinese: 培養；領養 We need to foster a sense of community.
example: 我們需要培養社區意識。

chinese: The air in the room was foul.
易碎的 Be careful, the glass is very fragile.
碎片 She found a fragment of ancient pottery.
example: 她發現了⼀塊古代陶器碎片。

chinese: 香味 The flowers have a lovely fragrance.
example: 這些花有⼀種迷人的香味。

chinese: 框架 He put the photo in a wooden frame.
The mother was frantic with worry.
霜 There was frost on the windows.
皺眉 He frowned at the bad news.
example: 他聽到壞消息時皺起了眉。

chinese: 挫折感 He kicked the ball in frustration.
履行；實現 She managed to fulfill her dream.
example: 她成功實現了她的夢想。

chinese: Fresh air is fundamental to good health.
example: 新鮮空氣是健康的基礎。

chinese: 聚集；收集 A crowd gathered outside the hotel.
使趨向於 The course is geared toward adults.
example: 這⾨課是針對成年人設計的。

chinese: 產生；引起 The new law will generate much debate.
example: 新法律將引發大量辯論。

chinese: 慷慨的 Thank you for your generous donation.
類型；流派 What genre of music do you like?
example: 你喜歡哪種類型的音樂？

chinese: It took her a long time to get over the flu.
example: 她花了很⻑時間才從流感中恢復。

chinese: 擺脫；丟棄 I want to get rid of these old clothes.
example: 我想把這些舊衣服丟掉。

chinese: 巨大的 The ship looked gigantic in the harbor.
example: 那艘船在港口看起來非常巨大。

chinese: 屈服於 Never give in to pressure.
極其漂亮的 You look gorgeous in that dress.
example: 妳穿那件洋裝看起來美極了。

chinese: 統治；管理 The country is governed by a king.
貪婪 His actions were motivated by greed.
example: 他的行為是由貪婪驅使的。

chinese: The future looks grim for the company.
example: 這家公司的未來前景黯淡。

chinese: 磨碎 You need to grind the coffee beans first.
保證 I guarantee you will love this book.
example: 我保證你會喜歡這本書。

指導方針 Please follow the safety guidelines.
The boat sailed into the harbor.
孵化 The eggs are about to hatch.
獸群；放牧 A herd of cows was grazing.
猶豫 He answered without any hesitation.
地平線；視野 The sun sank below the horizon.
人質 The terrorists took three hostages.

chinese: 敵對的 The desert is a hostile environment.
He is very humble about his success.
example: 他對自己的成功非常謙虛。

chinese: 完全相同的 They are identical twins.
辨識；認出 She could identify the driver.
身分 The police don't know the man's identity.

example: 如果我真的要去，我也會去的。

chinese: 插圖；例證 This is a clear illustration of the problem.
example: 這是該問題的⼀個清楚說明。

example: 他在乎自己的公眾形象。

chinese: 想像力 You need a lot of imagination to write.
example: 寫作需要豐富的想像力。

chinese: 想像 Imagine living on Mars!
模仿 Parrots can imitate human speech.
巨大的 The project required immense effort.

chinese: 免疫的 No one is immune to criticism.
影響；衝擊 The storm had a huge impact on the city.

chinese: 暗示 Silence does not imply agreement.
進口 We import a lot of oil.
強加；課徵 The government imposed a new tax.

改進；進步 I want to improve my English.
除此之外 In addition to the fruit, he ate a cake.
example: 除了水果，他還吃了⼀個蛋糕。

chinese: 萬⼀；如果 In case of fire, use the stairs.
example: 萬⼀發生火災，請使用樓梯。

chinese: 事件 The police are investigating the incident.
example: 警方正在調查這起事件。

chinese: 指出；顯示 The signs indicate that rain is coming.
個人；個別的 We must respect individual rights.
example: 我們必須尊重個人權利。

chinese: 導致；誘發 Drugs can induce sleep.

example: 我決定盡情吃⼀根巧克力棒。

chinese: 感染 The virus can infect anyone.
影響 My teacher had a great influence on me.
example: 我的老師對我有很大的影響。

chinese: 非正式的 It was an informal meeting.
繼承 She inherited a lot of money from her aunt.
example: 她從姑姑那裡繼承了⼀大筆錢。

chinese: 發起；開始 The company initiated a new project.
注射 The doctor injected the medicine.
天生的 He has an innate talent for music.
He was found innocent of the crime.
創新 We must innovate to stay ahead.
example: 我們必須創新以保持領先。

chinese: 創新 Technological innovation is fast.
詢問 I am writing to inquire about the job.
example: 我寫信是為了詢問工作的事。

chinese: 靈感 Nature is a source of inspiration.
例子 For instance, you could try exercise.
指示；指導 She instructed him to wait here.

完整無缺的 The vase remained intact after falling.
example: 花瓶摔落後依然完好無損。

chinese: 整合 The integration of the two teams took time.
example: 兩個團隊的整合花了⼀些時間。

chinese: 正直；誠信 He is a man of high integrity.
打算；意圖 I intend to finish this work today.
example: 我打算今天完成這項工作。

chinese: 強烈的 The heat was intense.
密集的 I am taking an intensive course.
意圖 I have no intention of leaving.
干擾；干涉 Don't interfere in my private life.
內部的 The internal structure of the building.
詮釋；翻譯 How do you interpret this data?
介入；干預 The teacher had to intervene in the fight.
example: 老師不得不介入那場打鬥。

chinese: 親密的 They have an intimate friendship.
涉及；包含 The accident involved three cars.
example: 這起事故涉及三輛汽車。

chinese: 諷刺的 It’s ironic that the fire station burned down.
